attributes.action: create a specific requirement for paedophile offenders to undertake and successfully complete a professionally run treatment plan prior to release from eithe a prison or hostel.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Paedophiles do not change.  They may develope an ability to control their behaviour or, more likely, conceal it, but are always a risk to children. It is as unfair to them to place them in a position of temptation as it is dangerous to children.  Specialist and properly sited Hostels are needed to ensure that adequate remedial courses are available to all such offenders.
